cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itai

sentence.kanji: 今日は頭が痛いです。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha atama ga itai desu
sentence.english: I have a headache today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hasei

sentence.kanji: 交差点で事故が発生した。
sentence.romaji: kousaten de jiko ga hasei shita
sentence.english: There was an accident at the intersection.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shupatsu

sentence.kanji: あと15分で出発です。
sentence.romaji: ato juugofun de shupatsu desu
sentence.english: Departure will be in fifteen minutes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hasha

sentence.kanji: バスが発車します。
sentence.romaji: basu ga hasha shimasu
sentence.english: The bus is leaving.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hapyou

sentence.kanji: 合格者が発表された。
sentence.romaji: goukakusha ga hapyou sareta
sentence.english: Those who passed were announced.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatsugen

sentence.kanji: 会議で全員が発言した。
sentence.romaji: kaigi de zenin ga hatsugen shita
sentence.english: Everyone spoke at the conference.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaihatsu

sentence.kanji: ダムの開発に住民は反対しています。
sentence.romaji: damu no kaihatsu ni juumin ha hantai shite imasu
sentence.english: The residents are against the development of the dam.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's byouin

sentence.kanji: 病院はどこですか。
sentence.romaji: byouin ha doko desu ka
sentence.english: Where is the hospital?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oishasan

sentence.kanji: 熱があるのでお医者さんに行った。
sentence.romaji: netsu ga aru no de oishasan ni ita
sentence.english: I went to the doctor because I had a fever.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukareru

sentence.kanji: 私は疲れてふらふらです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha tsukarete furafura desu
sentence.english: I'm tired and feel dizzy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's isha

sentence.kanji: 私は医者に相談した。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha isha ni soudan shita
sentence.english: I consulted the doctor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haken

sentence.kanji: 新しい星が発見された。
sentence.romaji: atarashii hoshi ga haken sareta
sentence.english: A new star was discovered.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's noboru

sentence.kanji: 私たちは昨年、富士山に登りました。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha sakunen fujisan ni noborimashita
sentence.english: We climbed Mount Fuji last year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haisha

sentence.kanji: 私は歯医者が嫌いです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha haisha ga kirai desu
sentence.english: I hate the dentist.

cards.english: welcome, go out to meet, invite
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mukaeru

sentence.kanji: 姉が空港まで迎えに来てくれます。
sentence.romaji: ane ga kuukou made mukaeni kite kuremasu
sentence.english: My big sister is coming to pick me up at the airport.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yaseru

sentence.kanji: 私は少し痩せました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha sukoshi yasemashita
sentence.english: I've lost a little weight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ku

sentence.kanji: 東京には23の区がある。
sentence.romaji: toukyou ni ha 23 no ku ga aru 。
sentence.english: There are 23 wards in Tokyo.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kugiru

sentence.kanji: フロアはパーティションで区切られています。
sentence.romaji: furoa ha pa-teishon de kugirarete imasu
sentence.english: The floor has been divided by a partition.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shihatsu

sentence.kanji: 始発の電車に乗りました。
sentence.romaji: shihatsu no densha ni norimashita
sentence.english: I took the first train.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatsubai

sentence.kanji: 新しい車が発売された。
sentence.romaji: atarashii kuruma ga hatsubai sareta
sentence.english: A new car was put on the market.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatsudensho

sentence.kanji: すぐそこに発電所があります。
sentence.romaji: sugu soko ni hatsudensho ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a power plant near here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakou

sentence.kanji: その雑誌は年に4回発行されているんだ。
sentence.romaji: sono zashi ha nen ni 4 kai hakou sarete iru n da
sentence.english: The magazine is issued four times a year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatsuon

sentence.kanji: この単語を発音してください。
sentence.romaji: kono tango wo hatsuon shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please pronounce this word.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kukaku

sentence.kanji: あそこの3区画は売り出し中です。
sentence.romaji: asoko no sankukaku ha uridashichuu desu
sentence.english: Those three sections are on sale.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuyakusho

sentence.kanji: 区役所に書類を届けてください。
sentence.romaji: kuyakusho ni shorui wo todokete kudasai
sentence.english: Please deliver the document to the ward office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は明日メキシコへ発ちます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ashita mekishiko he tachimasu
sentence.english: He will leave for Mexico tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatatsu

sentence.kanji: 通信技術の発達は目覚ましいな。
sentence.romaji: tsuushin gijutsu no hatatsu ha mezamashii na
sentence.english: The progress of communication technology is remarkable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanpatsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は先生に反発していたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sensei ni hanpatsu shite ita yo
sentence.english: He was rebelling against the teacher.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kubetsu

sentence.kanji: あの二人はそっくりで区別できない。
sentence.romaji: ano futari ha sokuri de kubetsu dekinai
sentence.english: Those two look identical and I can't tell them apart.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's byoushitsu

sentence.kanji: その病室はとても広くてきれいだった。
sentence.romaji: sono byoushitsu ha totemo hirokute kirei data
sentence.english: The hospital room was very large and clean.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's byounin

sentence.kanji: 病人が出たので電車が少し止まったんだ。
sentence.romaji: byounin ga deta no de densha ga sukoshi tomata n da
sentence.english: The train stopped for a while as someone was ill.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's igaku

sentence.kanji: 彼は医学を学んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha igaku wo manande imasu
sentence.english: He studies medicine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's byoushi

sentence.kanji: その作家は35歳という若さで病死した。
sentence.romaji: sono saka ha 35 sai to iu wakasa de byoushi shita
sentence.english: The writer died of an illness at the young age of 35.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukare

sentence.kanji: 最近疲れがたまっています。
sentence.romaji: saikin tsukare ga tamate imasu
sentence.english: My fatigue is building up these days.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kapatsu

sentence.kanji: 活発な意見が交されたの。
sentence.romaji: kapatsu na iken ga kawasareta no
sentence.english: A lively exchange of opinions took place.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tozan

sentence.kanji: 夏休みには家族で登山をします。
sentence.romaji: natsuyasumi ni ha kazoku de tozan wo shimasu
sentence.english: I'm going mountain climbing with my family during summer vacation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toukou

sentence.kanji: 生徒たちは朝8時ごろ登校します。
sentence.romaji: seitotachi ha asa 8 jigoro toukou shimasu
sentence.english: Pupils arrive at school around 8 AM.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yamanobori

sentence.kanji: 明日は友達と山登りに行きます。
sentence.romaji: ashita ha tomodachi to yamanobori ni ikimasu
sentence.english: I'm going mountain climbing with my friend tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zutsuu

sentence.kanji: 今日は頭痛がします。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha zutsuu ga shimasu
sentence.english: I have a headache today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haishi

sentence.kanji: その制度は廃止されました。
sentence.romaji: sono seido ha haishi saremashita
sentence.english: The system was abolished.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatsuden

sentence.kanji: ここでは太陽エネルギーを使って発電しています。
sentence.romaji: koko de ha taiyou enerugi- wo tsukate hatsuden shite imasu
sentence.english: We generate electricity with solar energy here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oubei

sentence.kanji: その会社は欧米に進出しているよね。
sentence.romaji: sono kaisha ha oubei ni shinshutsu shite iru yo ne
sentence.english: That company has moved into Europe and the United States.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kutsuu

sentence.kanji: 私は人前で話すことが苦痛です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha hitomae de hanasu koto ga kutsuu desu
sentence.english: It is painful for me to speak in front of other people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kubun

sentence.kanji: この表は年齢区分ごとの人口を表しています。
sentence.romaji: kono hyou ha nenrei kubun goto no jinkou wo arawashite imasu
sentence.english: This table shows the population divided into age groups.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanbyou

sentence.kanji: 彼女は一晩中彼を看病したの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha hitobanjuu kare wo kanbyou shita no
sentence.english: She nursed him all night long.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuiki

sentence.kanji: ここは危険区域よ。
sentence.romaji: koko ha kiken kuiki yo
sentence.english: This is a danger zone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itami

sentence.kanji: 背中に痛みがあります。
sentence.romaji: senaka ni itami ga arimasu
sentence.english: I have a pain in my back.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iryou

sentence.kanji: 医療関係の仕事をしています。
sentence.romaji: iryou kankei no shigoto wo shite imasu
sentence.english: I work in healthcare.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chiryou

sentence.kanji: 今、歯を治療しています。
sentence.romaji: ima ha wo chiryou shite imasu
sentence.english: I'm having my teeth treated now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoujou

sentence.kanji: 医者に症状を説明したよ。
sentence.romaji: isha ni shoujou wo setsumei shita yo
sentence.english: I explained the symptoms to the doctor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touroku

sentence.kanji: 心理学の授業に登録しましたか。
sentence.romaji: shinrigaku no jugyou ni touroku shimashita ka
sentence.english: Have you registered for the psychology class?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuubyou

sentence.kanji: 知り合いが急病で倒れた。
sentence.romaji: shiriai ga kyuubyou de taoreta
sentence.english: An acquaintance of mine suddenly fell ill.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hirou

sentence.kanji: 部下が疲労で倒れたの。
sentence.romaji: buka ga hirou de taoreta no
sentence.english: My subordinate collapsed from fatigue.

cards.english: generation of heat, get a fever
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatsunetsu

sentence.kanji: 娘が突然、発熱したんだ。
sentence.romaji: musume ga totsuzen hatsunetsu shita n da
sentence.english: My daughter suddenly developed a fever.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatsumei

sentence.kanji: 彼は偉大な発明王です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha idai na hatsumeiou desu
sentence.english: He's a great master of invention.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toujou

sentence.kanji: 彼女の登場で会場は盛り上がったね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no toujou de kaijou ha moriagata ne
sentence.english: The audience got excited as she appeared.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sumu

sentence.kanji: 山の空気は澄んでいますね。
sentence.romaji: yama no kuuki ha sunde imasu ne
sentence.english: The mountain air is clear.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itamu

sentence.kanji: 虫歯がずきずき痛みます。
sentence.romaji: mushiba ga zukizuki itamimasu
sentence.english: I have a throbbing toothache.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naguru

sentence.kanji: 彼は思わず友人を殴ったの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha omowazu yuujin wo naguta no
sentence.english: He hit his friend without thinking.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osaeru

sentence.kanji: 彼は怒りを抑えていたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ikari wo osaete ita no
sentence.english: He was restraining his anger.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinkou

sentence.kanji: 信仰は心の支えです。
sentence.romaji: shinkou ha kokoro no sasae desu
sentence.english: Faith uplifts the spirit.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's demukae

sentence.kanji: 空港へ彼女を出迎えに行きました。
sentence.romaji: kuukou he kanojo wo demukae ni ikimashita
sentence.english: I went to the airport to pick her up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mukae

sentence.kanji: 駅まで迎えに来て下さい。
sentence.romaji: eki made mukae ni kite kudasai
sentence.english: Please come pick me up at the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryou

sentence.kanji: 彼は会社の寮に住んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaisha no ryou ni sunde imasu
sentence.english: He lives in the company dormitory.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kangei

sentence.kanji: 温かい歓迎を受けました。
sentence.romaji: atatakai kangei wo ukemashita
sentence.english: I received a warm welcome.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ishi

sentence.kanji: 医師に入院を勧められたの。
sentence.romaji: ishi ni nyuuin wo susumerareta no
sentence.english: The doctor suggested I admit myself to a hospital.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuse

sentence.kanji: 爪をかむ癖は直した方がいい。
sentence.romaji: tsume wo kamu kuse ha naoshita hou ga ii
sentence.english: You should stop the habit of biting your nails.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's geri

sentence.kanji: 古いお寿司を食べて下痢をしてしまったんだ。
sentence.romaji: furui osushi wo tabete geri wo shite shimata n da
sentence.english: I got diarrhea from eating old sushi.
